item.title: Changing chatbox text color
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Eric E., post:44, topic:174070”][quote author=shangtsung1 link=topic=234416.msg2001319#msg2001319 date=1200573263]
if you wanna make your own colors heres a site for the colors http://www.w3schools.com/html/html_colors.asp

    if(s.equals("colorthingy"))
        return thecolor;

[/quote]

This is Java not HTML, therefore, this will not work. Your compiler will say there’s an error.

Nice tutorial, helped out a lot!!!

Eric E.[/quote]
That made no sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing chatbox text color
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

[quote=“shangtsung1, post:2, topic:174070”]if you wanna make your own colors heres a site for the colors http://www.w3schools.com/html/html_colors.asp

    if(s.equals("colorthingy"))
        return thecolor;[/quote]

This is Java not HTML, therefore, this will not work. Your compiler will say there’s an error.

Nice tutorial, helped out a lot!!!

Eric E.

Read full topic
